Text: They're all free because they're all shite.
No they aren't! You havent try them! One game named Dink Smallwood is allmost same as Helbreath and Theres Gta versions 1 and 2!

But Mr Ian and darth_tater seems to have tested them all. Impressing! Because I hope you two really have tested them all and don't just talk shit all the time.

Also, Duke Nukem 3D is the BEST FPS ever made in my oppinion, though only the demo is included in this torrent.

miekkailija, maybe you could have left out the shareware games, otherwise it's a pretty neat torrent. Gonna have these games a try.
